kiddos, I'm afraid I have what we in elite scientific circles call "bad news".

If I wore a hat, I'd take it off to you!
If I wore a hat, I'd take it off to you!
But I'm not much of a hat guy. I put A LOT of time into doing my hair, and a hat would just ruin it.
Anyhoo, King Boo must be furious right now.
Let's pay him a visit, eh?
Amazing, %1$s! Simply amazing!
Amazing, kiddos! Simply amazing!
You're the finest ghost hunter I've ever laid eyes on! They didn't even know what hit 'em!
You're the finest ghost hunters I've ever laid eyes on! They didn't even know what hit 'em!
Sit tight - I'm firing up the Pixelshifter.
Nice work, %1$s.
Nice work, kiddos.
You sure took your sweet time, but you've prevented a major catastrophe.
You sure took your sweet time, but you've prevented a major catastrophe.
Sit tight - I'm firing up the Pixelshifter.
I knew it all along, I tell you! King Boo was the one sending ghosts to reclaim the mansions.
I knew it all along, I tell you! King Boo was the one sending ghosts to reclaim the mansions.
I reckon he flew into a rage every time we recovered one of the Dark Moon pieces.
And now he's sent a horde of ghosts to regain control of the Treacherous Mansion!
The place has been completely overrun! I'm afraid we really are in trouble now, my boy.
The place has been completely overrun! I'm afraid we really are in trouble now, kiddos.
If he reclaims that mansion, his army of ghosts will be able to invade all of Evershade Valley and beyond!
%1$s, you're gonna have to give this one all you've got!
Kiddos, you're gonna have to give this one all you've got!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.e_boss.1: You've done it, my boy! You've actually done it! The final Dark Moon piece!
You've done it, kiddos! You've actually done it! The final Dark Moon piece!
It's not gonna be easy, but I'll try to bring you out of that horrible illusion!
It's not gonna be easy, but I'll try to bring you out of that horrible illusion.
Right then, Pixelshifter, this one is crucial! Don't fail me now!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.e_boss.e: Phew! You made it back this time. Good work, kiddo.
Phew! You made it back this time. Welcome back, kiddo.
Did you manage to capture any new ghosts with the Poltergust 5000?
Did you manage to capture any new ghosts with the Poltergust 5000s?
Hmm... I suppose I didn't really expect you to.
But at least you got to sharpen your skills by taking on the most powerful Possessor again!
But at least you got to sharpen your skills by taking on the most powerful Possessor again!
Be honest, %1$s - you went back through that portal just for the adrenaline rush, didn't you?
Be honest, kiddos - you went back through that portal just for the adrenaline rush, didn't you?
Ho ho! You've come a long way, you wild thrill-seeker, you! Never thought I'd see the day!
Ho ho! You've come a long way, you wild thrill-seekers, you! Never thought I'd see the day!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.e_boss.s: All right, kiddos! Let's do this!
Just know that I'm very proud of you, my boy. Very proud. *Sniff*
Just know that I'm very proud of you, kiddos. Very proud. *Sniff*
All the paths seem to be leading towards that mysterious portal on the terrace.
The Parascope can't detect the Dark Moon piece anywhere, but there's nowhere else it could be.
And the same goes for King Boo...
He must be beyond the portal, and no doubt furious that you captured all the ghosts he sent through it!
He must be beyond the portal, and no doubt furious that you captured all the ghosts he sent through it!
And last but not least, your brother, Mario! King Boo must have taken him through the portal too.
And last but not least, your brother, Mario! King Boo must have taken him through the portal too.
This is it. The moment of truth.
Look, %1$s. If you, uh... don't ever come back, just know...
Look, kiddos. If you, uh... don't ever come back, just know...
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.final.1: Mwah ha ha! Now what do we have here?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.final.2: Why, if it isn't my old pal %1$s! Or is it Baby %1$s? I can't tell the difference.
Why, if it isn't my old pals! Or are they babies? I can't tell the difference.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.final.3: Hey, remember that time you trapped me in a painting for all eternity? That was a lot of fun.
Hey, remember that time you trapped me in a painting for all eternity? That was a lot of fun.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.final.4: But guess what! I GOT OUT! And now I'm painting the town red!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.final.5: Yes, it was I who broke the Dark Moon!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.final.6: Not a difficult task when you have a power-enhancing jewel on your crown like this one.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.final.7: And now that all the ghosts of Evershade Valley are under my control, it's time for the rest of you to become my subjects too!
And now that all the ghosts of Evershade Valley are under my control, it's time for the rest of you to become my subjects too!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.final.8: You, that annoying scientist, and all your friends will look great hanging on the walls of my throne room!
You, that annoying scientist, and all your friends will look great hanging on the walls of my throne room!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.gold_bon: Hmm... You seem to have found something very special there, %1$s!
Hmm... You seem to have found something very special there, kiddos!
I've heard that your chances of finding those is better if you have a lot of treasure.
I've heard that your chances of finding those is better if you have a lot of treasure.
I get the feeling that bone will come in handy when you find things can't get any worse.
I get the feeling that bone will come in handy when you find things can't get any worse.
But that's just a wild guess. Yep, pure speculation.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.10: Anyhoo, it's been too long, my boy! What have you been up to?
Anyhoo, it's been too long, kiddos! What have you been up to?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.11: I imagine you've been off adventuring with that daredevil brother of yours.
I imagine you've been off adventuring with that daredevil brother of yours.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.12: Me? Oh, I've just been continuing my research on paranormal happenings and whatnot.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.13: In fact, after our last adventure I became something of an authority in the field!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.14: But enough about that. Let me fill you in on our ghostly predicament.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.15: See that on the screen? That there is the Dark Moon.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.16: It's a myterious celestial body that has a pacifying effect on all the ghosts in the Evershade Valley.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.17: When I heard about it, I jumped at the rare chance to study ghosts in a peaceful environment.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.18: It was incredible, my boy! I was conducting the best research of my long and storied career!
It was incredible, kiddos! I was conducting the best research of my long and storied career!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.19: That is, until something snapped inside the ghosts, and they suddenly got all hostile!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.2: I need your help, sonny! It's an emergency!
I need your help, kiddos! It's an emergency!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.20: It got so bad, I had to escape from the Gloomy Manor and hide here, where the ghosts can't find me.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.21: Of course, I'm not one to sit around and twindle my thumbs. I wanted to know why the ghosts freaked out.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.22: So I settled in and did some research to figure out what had happened.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.23: That's when I discovered something truly astonishing: the Dark Moon had vanished from the sky!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.24: And on top of that, the whole of Evershade Valley had become enveloped in an eerie fog.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.25: Now, I can't be sure, but I think the disappearance of the Dark Moon is what caused all this mess.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.26: And what a mess it is!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.27: If we don't put things right, the ghosts might leave the valley and cause trouble troughout the world!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.28: Worse still, my research will go to waste! We can't let that happen, my boy!
Worse still, my research will go to waste! We can't let that happen, kiddos!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.29: Fortunately, I know where to start! Let me show you something.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.30: I found a Dark Moon fragment nearby. The thing must have been broken.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.31: But there's something else, too. See how this piece is corrupted with some kind of energy?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.32: I reckon it's a disruptive energy that suppresses the Dark Moon's ability to pacify ghosts!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.33: But lucky for us, I've got inventions for all kinds of situations!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.35: Heh heh! I've done it, %1$s! It seems to have regained its original power!
Heh heh! I've done it, kiddos! It seems to have regained its original power!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.36: And did you hear that whooshing noise outside, youngster?
And did you hear that whooshing noise outside, youngsters?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.39: All the fog around the bunker... is gone!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.4: Um... What are you doing on the floor?
Um... What are you doing on the floor?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.40: Quick! Let's take a look at my map of Evershade Valley.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.41: %1$s, do you know what this means? We should be able to reach the Gloomy Manor now!
Kiddos, do you know what this means? We should be able to reach the Gloomy Manor now!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.42: But more importantly, it means that restoring the Dark Moon will solve all our problems!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.43: If we find all the Dark Moon pieces, the fog in the valley will vanish and the ghosts will return to normal.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.44: But until then, all those ghosts will need to be contained. That's where you come in, %1$s!
But until then, all those ghosts will need to be contained. That's where you come in, kiddos!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.45: Why, you're the best ghost wrangler I know, son!
Why, you're the best ghost wranglers I know, kids!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.46: Coincidentally, you're also the only ghost wrangler I know...
Coincidentally, you're also the only ghost wranglers I know...
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.47: So, what do you say, sonny? Will you help me capture the ghosts and restore the Dark Moon?
So, what do you say, young fellers? Will you help me capture the ghosts and restore the Dark Moon?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.48: Ho ho! Of course you will! It'll be just like old times!
Ho ho! Of course you will! It'll be just like old times!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.5: Never mind that, I'm preparing the Pixelshifter!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.8: Greetings, %1$s! I knew our paths would cross again.
Greetings, kiddos! I knew our paths would cross again.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.intro.9: You seem awful tense, sonny. Relax! We're perfectly safe here in this impenetrable bunker!
You seem awful tense, kids. Relax! We're perfectly safe here in this impenetrable bunker!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.jewel_ca: Doing some gemstone hunting on the side, eh, feller?
Doing some gemstone hunting on the side, eh, fellers?
Can't say I blame you. Each one of those collectible gems is unique and invaluable!
But remember - you've got a job to do!
You'll have time to look at your gems in the vault later. Carry on, youngster.
You'll have time to look at your gems in the vault later. Carry on, youngsters.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.money_ca: Hey there, sonny! I see you've been busy collecting coins, banknotes and gold bars.
Hey there, kiddos! I see you've been busy collecting coins, banknotes and gold bars.
Nothing wrong with that! The mansion is abandoned, so "finders keepers", I suppose!
As a matter of fact, I'm also gathering some resources of my own.
Yep, I'm gonna use them to develop upgrades for the Poltergust 5000!
Yep, I'm gonna use them to develop upgrades for the Poltergust 5000s!
Good luck on your treasure hunt, young feller!
Good luck on your treasure hunt, young fellers!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:dialog.sprint_c: %1$s? Come in, %1$s. You there, young feller?
Kiddos? Come in, kiddos. You there, young fellers?
You sure took your time. I was worried you'd turned off the volume on your DS.
You sure took your time. I was worried you'd turned off the volume on your DS-es.
Anyhoo, it looks like everything is working, so we should be good.
Anyhoo, it looks like everything is working, so we should be good.
You look a little nervous, son. Try to loosen up a bit.
You look a little nervous, kiddos. Try to loosen up a bit.
Besides, tiptoeing about won't get us anywhere.
You can run by holding sprint while moving around. Now get going!
You can run by holding sprint while moving around. Now get going!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.ancient_: This ancient poltergeist was hiding one of the clock hands from the clock tower gate. Over the years he has learned to control not just air, but sand as well!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.aweberry: His favorite thing to do is dip himself in mud and pretend it's chocolate. It's... odd, to say the least.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.awelliga: Much like a real alligator, he hides under the water until someone steps a little too close.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.bad_mint: He's not bad, per se. He's just... really mischievous.
He tries to roar ferociously, but what comes out sounds more like an adorable kitty meowing. Don't tell him I said that.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.beetle_w: This ghost isn't exactly a people person. He gets downright grumpy when disturbed, and won't hesitate to "introduce" you to his beetle friends.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.big_polt: These pooches are pretty big, and with that size comes strength. It might even take a team of ghost trackers to keep one of these pups under control!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.blimp_re: Instead of a scythe, he walks around with a giant roast turkey leg. Uh huh...
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.blobberf: This ghost isn't anywhere near as graceful as a regular butterfly, or as harmless.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.blue_pim: I imagine he would have chosen green flowers instead of blue, but green flowers are surprisingly difficult to find. Who would've guessed?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.bomb_bro: These identical twin brothers sure have a blast playing with bombs!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.cawe.des: I don't recommend pouring this ghostly bovine's milk over your cereal. Trust me on this. I'm still cleaning up the mess.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.clown_fi: The reason this fellow is so angry is because people keep thinking clown fish are actual clowns. They're not. No sense of humor whatsoever. Didn't laugh at any of my jokes.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.cold_cat: Slammers are mainly known for their strength, but this one has enough brains to know that when it's cold, you need to wear a coat!
There gooey ghosts love to cuddle and hold you tight. But when the Dark Moon broke apart, they forgot about the cuddling part. Watch out for them above and below!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.creeper_: An enormous ghost with the uncanny ability to produce other ghosts! I've never seen anything like it! I'd recommend ghost hunters deal with him in a group, just to be safe.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.daisy.de: When he's not hungry, he's probably as gentle as a freshly picked flower. Too bad we'll never know, though; this fellow has a bottomless stomach.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.dreadonf: He doesn't have two pairs of wings. In fact, he doesn't have any wings. What good are wings on a ghost?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.footbraw: I'd stay out of his way unless you want to get tackled. Nothing like a bit of protective padding to bring out your boisterous side.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.freaker_: It seems this narcissistic ghost doesn't like turning invisible because it makes it harder for the other ghosts to be dazzled by its fashion sense.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.fright_f: Criminy! I didn't think something so small could be so... terrifying! The size-to scare ratio of this little guy is off the charts!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.fright_k: Rumour has it that this Greenie comes from the middle ages, where he was a knight searching for a kidnapped princess. Sadly, wherever he went, she always seemed to be in another castle.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.go_bee.d: Instead of covering everything with goo, our stripey friend here prefers to splatter the walls and floors with honey. But be careful not to lick it! It'll make your tongue go numb.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.gobber.d: Their appetite is formidable, and given that their stomachs have no physical boundaries, they just devour everything around them! Be wary of the puddles of goo.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.gold_gre: These greedy Greenies traded their slimy bodies for ones made of molten gold! Can't say I blame them.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.goolf.de: The only thing he enjoys more than playing golf is creating "hazards" on the green.
They like to tinker with things they shouldn't and wield everyday objects as weapons. First, find a way to disarm them, then stun them with your flashlight when the time is right.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.grouchy_: This magnificent ghost possessed a spider queen in his efforts to hold on to his Dark Moon piece. %1$s really had to use his noggin to outsmart this spectre! He has his moments.
This magnificent ghost possessed a spider queen in his efforts to hold on to his Dark Moon piece. The kiddos really had to use their noggin to outsmart this spectre! They have their moments.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.harsh_po: This Possessor was hiding at the top of the giant tree in the Haunted Towers. He possessed a wooden staircase, of all things, and then tried to eat %1$s! I thought the lad was going to faint!
This Possessor was hiding at the top of that giant tree in the Haunted Towers. He possessed a wooden staircase, of all things, and then tried to eat the kiddos! I thought they were going to faint!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.hider.de: These clever fellows love playing hide-and-seek. A bit impatient, though, so if you take too long to find them, they'll start throwing things at you! Stay on your toes!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.horrorca: Fascinating! This ghost appears to speak fluent Whale!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.jack_goo: It's always "trick or trick" with this guy! He seems to have conveniently forgotten the treat part. Sheesh!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.lady_gug: His name may have "bird" in it, but don't expect him to sing for you.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.leoprank: His hunting method is simple but effective: He waits until someone steps on him.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.overset_: To protect the Dark Moon piece within him, he possessed the huge clock face at the top of the tower and called on hordes of ghosts to help him out. A battle to remember!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.pink_zin: Whenever he appears, he's hard to miss!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.polterge: These big-headed know-it-alls have swollen brains (and egos) that afford them telekinetic power. Sadly, this seems to come at the cost of a sense of humor.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.polterpu: Normally very playful and kind, these ghostly dogs only started misbehaving after the Dark Moon shattered.
I haven't come up with a name for this mischievous and adorable Polterpup yet. He's caused us a whole mess of trouble, but I think the playful tyke just wants someone to take him in.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.pondguin: I tried to feed him some fish, but he wouldn't eat them. He just kept trying to scare them. It didn't work.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.primordi: This ancient ghost here is your chief Creeper. Be careful around this fellow, or you might get more than you bargained for!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.scareabl: Eureka! This ghostly egg can reassemble itself once it's cracked!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.scars.de: Even though he's both a zombie and a ghost, he has fun and enjoys life to the fullest.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.scool.de: On first impression, you might think this fellow is creepy, but once you get to know him... you know for sure.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.scorn.de: his funny-looking ghost has kernels for teeth. I bet he wishes he could pop them all at once - if not to give people a big ol'fright, at least to get free popcorn at the cinema.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.shrewd_p: Assuming the form of a huge icy monster, this Possessor tunnelled down through the mine in an effort to escape with his Dark Moon piece. %1$s was lucky to survive the ordeal!
Assuming the form of a huge icy monster, this Possessor tunnelled down through the mine in an effort to escape with his Dark Moon piece. The kiddos were lucky to survive the ordeal!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.shriek_s: The entire time I've been observing him, this tough looking spook has been practicing swimming through the air like a shark. Still needs some work.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.sister_b: One of the fabled Three Sisters. According to her sister Herlinda, she's the eldest. She is an expert on flowers and plants, and loves gardening.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.sister_h: One of the fabled Three Sisters. According to her sister Belinda, she's the eldest. She thinks she's prettier than a flower and spends all her time looking at herself in the mirror.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.sister_l: The youngest of the fabled Three Sisters. Her hobbies include playing with her mirror and annoying her older sisters by pointing out their many flaws.
They might look like ruthless brutes, but these ghosts usually have a heart of gold. Right now, though, they ARE ruthless brutes, so watch out for shockwaves when they clap!
These ghosts are swift and cunning. They love to turn invisible and sneak up behind targets of their pranks, so use the Dark-Light Device to catch them out!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.soccer_b: Whatever you do, don't try to pick him up or touch him with your hands! He hates that. Oddly, though, he doesn't seem to mind if you knock him around with your feet.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.spookumb: Although his body looks like a big ol' melon, the vertical stripes have a slimming effect.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.spooky_s: That's not a costume. He's just really retro.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.strong_g: These massive, disgusting ghosts can destroy an entire mansion faster than you can say, "flying phelm". Watch out when they release their goo, or capturing them will be a nightmare.
The crystals of the mine have really changed these charming fellows. They're now much stronger and more able to get into shenanigans. Don't let them get equipped!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.strong_h: Now that these ghosts have been augmented by the crystals, capturing them is even trickier. It's best to wait until they show themselves to stun them.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.strong_p: As if they weren't enough trouble already, the crystals have augmented these brainy ghosts' telekinetic powers. I wouldn't want to run into this guy in a dark alley. That's for sure.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.strong_s: Whoever strengthened these bullies by putting them into the crystals had only one thing in mind: creating ghosts strong enough to crush rocks into dust with a single blow.
This guy is trouble! He's tougher and meaner than a normal Sneaker, and all those marks on his body are bristling with power!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.sun_flow: Heh! The funny thing... heh heh... the funny thing is... he can't stand the sun! Ho ho! Oho! Hooooo... Is that irony? I never know if I'm using that word correctly.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.tennis_m: Careful with this one! He's been known to sneak onto tennis courts midmatch and cover the ball with ghostly goo!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.terrible: These twin sneakers are trouble with a capital T! Mess with them and you're likely to be teleported out of the room! I learned that the hard way.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.terroran: Once he helped a farmer win a contest by pretending he was a gigantic orange. Don't ask me how I know that.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.tether_j: At first I thought he was trying to attack me, but then I realised he just wanted me to try on his fancy jacket. He could have just asked...
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.the_brai: This ghost is the most cunning of the Boffins. He awaits ghost trackers who are both brave and smart enough to match his powers.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.tough_po: This Possessor managed to possess multiple suits of armour at the same time. An impressive feat! I was less impressed when he used those suits of armour to try to squish %1$s.
This Possessor managed to possess multiple suits of armour at the same time. An impressive feat! I was less impressed when he used those suits of armour to try to squish the kiddos.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.violet.d: When he's in puddle form, he looks like a little garden dotted with beautiful flowers. It's really breathtaking... but not in a good way.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.wurdle.d: This ghost would have you believe that he moves really slowly, but don't be fooled - it's just an act. Yep, this one's not just crafty, he's pretty swift too!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:entity.yukata_b: After a nice hot shower and with no other plans for the day, this Gobber slips right into his bathrobe and gets ready to lounge around. This ghost is living the dream.
Between you and me, his striped camouflage seems a bit unnecessary considering he can turn invisible whenever he wants.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:location.gloomy: I, Professor Elvin Gadd, had been observing the ghosts living in the Gloomy Manor, when suddenly the Dark Moon broke into pieces, and the ghosts got all hostile-like!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:location.haunte: These remarkable towers are built around a colossal tree. The original owners had a liking for gardening and exotic plants, which are now growing out of control!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:location.king_b: King Boo has created the ultimate illusion and he's waiting for you to show yourself. Are you brave enough to face him in his own territory once again?
King Boo has created the ultimate illusion and he's waiting for you to show yourselves. Are you brave enough to face him in his own territory once again?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:location.old_cl: This factory once produced the world's finest clocks and time measurement devices. Your watch probably comes from here and you don't even know it!
This factory once produced the world's finest clocks and time measurement devices. Your watches probably come from here and you don't even know it!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:location.secret: Some determined geologists set up a mining operation in these snow-capped mountains, but they got scared and abandoned it after the ghosts moved in!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:location.treach: This massive mansion is filled with exotic exhibits fashioned by its globetrotting late owner. Oh, and it also has the strongest paranormal signals ever recorded!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.boo_b_t: I always knew you'd fall for me! Boo B. Trap strikes again!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.boo_boo: Oopsie. I think I made a Boo Boo...
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.boo_can: This special container was expressly designed to hold Boos. For everyone's sake, try to capture every last one of them!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.boofoon: Hey what's all this funny business?
I'm Boouncer! You think you can be in here? Naw, mate. Not with those shoes.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.boogie_: Booah ha ha! I'm Boogie Woogie! Let's dance!
Boo-ha-ha! I'm Boogie Woogie! Let's dance!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.boolean: Am I Boolean? True or false?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.boolldo: Arf, arf! Grrrrrr... Better run from Boolldog!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.booluga: I'm Booluga! I used to be covered in blubber, but then I went on a die-it!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.boony_r: Boo! You found me! Nobody hare except Boony Raboot!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.boopa_t: Boopa Troopa, reporting for duty! The Boo armies are here, so you might as well surrender!
Boopa Troopa, reporting for duty! The Boo armies are here, so you might as well surrender!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.booreau: Ahem... I am Booreaucrat! This mansion is now under the ownership of King Boo, Esquire.
Are you authorised to be here? Your identification and mansion roaming permit, please.
Are you authorised to be here? Your identification and mansion roaming permit, please.
You don't have them? That's... unfortunate. I have no choice but to penalise you.
You don't have them? That's... unfortunate. I have no choice but to penalise you.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.bootine: Boo ha ha! I'm Booillon. Shall I let you stew a bit or pulverise you now?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.call: Incoming call from Professor E. Gadd!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.dark_mo: The Dark Moon has shattered, %1$s! We need to find it and restore peace to Evershade Valley, posthaste!
The Dark Moon has shattered, kiddos! We need to find it and restore peace to Evershade Valley, posthaste!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.e_gadds: I'll send all the ghosts and trinkets you collect during your adventure down to the vault for safekeeping. Check them out, sonny!
I'll send all the ghosts and trinkets you collect during your adventure down to the vault for safekeeping. Check them out, kiddos!
Complete the first mission in the Gloomy Manor to unlock E. Gadd's Vault!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.french_: Yip yip! I'm French Boodle! Aren't I bootiful?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.gem_col: Look at all the unique gems you've found throughout the mansions of Evershade Valley.
Each amethyst is unique. Collect them all.
Each emerald is unique. Collect them all.
Each ruby is unique. Collect them all.
Each sapphire is unique. Collect them all.
Each diamond is unique. Collect them all.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.ghost_c: All the ghosts you've captured are held here. You can view a specimen of each ghost type and read the notes E. Gadd has compiled.
All the ghosts you've captured are held here. You can view a specimen of each ghost type and read the notes E. Gadd's compiled.
The ghostly residents of Evershade Valley that you have captured
The ghostly residents of Evershade Valley that you have captured
Special ghosts captured within the mysterious floors of Thrill Tower.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.jambool: Don't you dare call me GumBoo! My name be JamBoolaya!
Don't you dare call me GumBoo! My name be JamBoolaya!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.mamboo: A one, and a two, and we all love MamBoo! Except for you!
A one, and a two, and we all love MamBoo! Except for you!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.maraboo: I'm MaraBoo! Aren't my feathers classy?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.ooga_bo: Did I scare you? My name is  wait for it  Ooga Booga
Did I scare you? My name's - wait for it - Ooga Booga!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.paraboo: I've set my derivative to zero to be at my peak!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.scaresc: A nightmarish skyscraper full of ghostly challenges await you and your courageous friends! Can you battle your way to the top?
A nightmarish skyscraper full of ghostly challenges await you and your courageous friends! Can you battle your way to the top?
Ideal for four experienced players. Virtually impossible on your own, but do you have the guts to take it on as a duo?
Recommended for two or three players, but go in alone if you're feeling bold.
Ideal for playing solo or for a group of inexperienced players wanting to get some practice in.
This tricksy tower is teeming with ghostly challenges for you and your fellow ghost hunters to tackle. Access it in the bunker!
This tricksy tower is teeming with ghostly challenges for you and your fellow ghost hunters to tackle. Access it in the bunker!
Climb ten floors in Thrill Tower!
Climb five floors in Thrill Tower!
Go on an endless and increasingly difficuly journy up Thrill Tower!
Hunt down ghosts and clear each floor as quickly as possible!
Use effective teamwork to hunt down ghosts and clear each floor as quickly as possible!
Track down Polterpups with your Dark-Light Device and capture every last one of those pesky mutts!
Track down Polterpups with your Dark-Light Devices and capture every last one of those pesky mutts!
Find the hatch before the time runs out! Extend the time limit by getting timepieces from objects and ghosts.
Find the exit hatch before time runs out! Extend the time limit by getting timepieces from objects and ghosts.
Make your way to the top unaware of what challenge you'll face next!
Make your way to the top unaware of what challenge you'll face next!
You've beaten Thrill Tower in hunter mode!
You've beaten Thrill Tower in hunter mode!
You've beaten Thrill Tower in polterpup mode!
You've beaten Thrill Tower in polterpup mode!
You've beaten Thrill Tower in rush mode!
You've beaten Thrill Tower in rush mode!
You've beaten Thrill Tower in surpise mode!
You've beaten Thrill Tower in surpise mode!
It'll take more than one ghost tracker to hold on to a big Polterpup!
A special encounter awaits you every five floors!
Use the Dark-Light Device to find the trails that lead to the hiding Polterpups!
Use the Dark-Light Device to remove curses from teammates!
Dark-Light Goggles allow you to see the invisible!
Use a fully charged Strobulb flash to stun several ghosts at once!
Melons and jack-o'-lanterns may have surprises hidden inside!
Timepieces can be collected from capturing ghosts too!
The faster you activate the hatch, the more treasure you'll get!
Capture all the ghosts to advance to the next floor!
Getting your hands on the map lets you see the layout of the entire floor!
Sneak on the map to place a marker for the other players to see.
If a ghost has a paranormal shield, watch the colour of the Pull meter!
With the power of Poltergust x2 or Poltergust x3, catching ghosts is a breeze!
Use the Dark-Light Device to find the trails that lead to hiding Polterpups!
Capture ghosts with a well-timed Pull to get extra treasure!
The more red coins you get, the better your chance of winning the bonus spin!
The HealVac converts captured ghosts into hearts!
To revive fallen teammates, stand over them and interact with them.
Ghosts love to hide. Keep an eye out for shaking furniture!
The taller the tower, the greater your chances of coming across rare boss ghosts.
Teleporter wardrobes can help you navigate the floor strategically!
Collect timepieces to extend the time limit while you look for the hatch!
Rescue teammates from carpet traps by pulling on the corner tassels!
Capture multiple ghosts at once to receive a treasure bonus!
Equipment upgrades are awarded to the entire team!
Use the interact item to communicate with players, use multiple times in a row for different messages.
Complete a certain number of missions in the Gloomy Manor to unlock the Thrill Tower multiplayer mode!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:message.unlocka: Unlockables
You currently have %1$sG
You currently have %1$sG
Dark-Light level 2
Thanks to this upgrade, the Dark-Light Device won't overheat as quickly! Pretty cool, eh?
Thanks to this upgrade, the Dark-Light Devices won't overheat as quickly! Pretty cool, eh?
Dark-Light level 3
Your Dark-Light Device now has the most efficient cooling device available. No ghost can hide from you!
Your Dark-Light Devices now have the most efficient cooling device available. No ghost can hide from you!
View the treasure and upgrades you've acquired!
View the treasure and upgrades you've acquired!
You've unlocked all upgrades! Congratulations!
You have unlocked all upgrades! Congratulations!

Collect %2$sG to unlock your next upgrade for the Poltergust 5000s!

I've extended the Pull to allow for a stronger pull. Charge the meter till it's full, then use the Poltergust to weaken the ghosts even more!
I've extended the Pull to allow for a stronger pull. Charge the meter till it's full, then use the Poltergust to weaken the ghosts even more!

luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.a_1.des: If we're to restore the Dark Moon, we'll need to get you properly equipped. I've got just the device for the job, but I left it in the Gloomy Manor! Mind fetching it for me, sonny?
If we're to restore the Dark Moon, we'll need to get you properly equipped. I've got just the devices for the job, but I left it in the Gloomy Manor! Mind fetching it for me, kiddos?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.a_1.goa: Find the Poltergust 5000 in the garage, and capture some ghosts for E. Gadd.
Find the Poltergust 5000s in the Garage, and capture some ghosts for E. Gadd.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.a_2.des: Now that you're equipped, let's go on with finding those Dark Moon pieces! Paranormal readings are stronger in the north rooms of the Gloomy Manor, so we should start our search there.
Now that you're equipped, let's go on with finding those Dark Moon pieces! Paranormal readings are stronger in the north rooms of the Gloomy Manor, so we should start our search there.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.a_2.goa: Activate the mechanism in the foyer to access the north rooms of the Gloomy Manor.
Activate the mechanism in the foyer.
Recover the gear in the lab.
Recover the gear in the parlor.
Recover the gear in the study.
Recover the gear in the studio.
Pesky ghosts have stolen the gears to the mechanism in the main hall! Search the west wing of the Gloomy Manor, and recover all four gears.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.a_3.des: According to the Parascope, ghostly activity in the north of the Gloomy Manor is increasing! Now that you've recovered the gears, we'll be able to investigate.
According to the Parascope, the ghostly activity in the north of the Gloomy Manor is increasing! Now that you've recovered the gears, we'll be able to investigate.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.a_3.goa: Use the crank to operate the access mechanism in the main hall. Once done, proceed north through the Gloomy Manor and investigate the music in the library.
Use the crank in the foyer.
Investigate the music in the library.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.a_4.des: Criminy! Someone's been casting illusions in the Gloomy Manor! We'll need my Dark-Light Device to see through this hooey. I'm pretty sure I left it in the lab.
Criminy! Someone's been casting illusions in the Gloomy Manor! We'll need my Dark-Light Devices to see through this hooey. I'm pretty sure I left them in the lab.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.a_4.goa: Someone has been releasing Spirit Balls and making things disappear! Retrieve the Dark-Light Device from the lab and find the culprit.
Someone has been releasing Spirit Balls and making things disappear! Retrieve the Dark-Light Devices from the lab, and find the culprit.
Capture whoever is releasing the Spirit Balls.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.a_5.des: Clean up those darn spiderwebs! They're blocking our progress AND they're ruining the furniture AND they're just plain gross!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.a_5.goa: Spiders have infested the Gloomy Manor and filled it with their webs. Destroy every last web with the Poltergust 5000!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.a_bonus: We have an... interesting situation. The Parascope is picking up mild paranormal signals in the manor. I'm sending you in to investigate.
We have an... interesting situation. The Parascope is picking up mild paranormal signals in the manor. I'm sending you in to investigate.
A group of ghosts have returned to the Gloomy Manor! Catch all the ghosts as quickly as possible.
Capture all the ghosts as quickly as possible!
This paranormal reading is off the charts! I don't know what's down in that cellar, but it's not happy. Why don't you... uh... investigate?
This paranormal reading is off the charts! I don't know what's down in that cellar, but it's not happy. Why don't you, uh... investigate?
Take the lift to the bottom level, then investigate the cellar and find the origin of the strong paranormal signal.
Confront the source of the powerful energy.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.b_1.des: The towers' machinery isn't active. My guess is that some ghosts have broken it. We need to get the hydro generator running so we can search for the next Dark Moon piece.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.b_1.goa: Most of the machinery in the Haunted Towers is powered by water. Check the hydro generator and make sure the water is flowing normally.
Fix the water pump on the roof.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.b_2.des: With the water flow restored in the Haunted Towers, we can resume our search for the Dark Moon piece. And now I have a better idea of where it might be!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.b_2.goa: The next Dark Moon piece has been located in the upper section of the hollow tree. Explore the interior of the hollow tree and find a way up.
Find three vanes in the east hall.
Find a vane in the seedling laboratory.
Find a vane in the conservatory.
Find a vane in the tool shed.
Find a vane in the gardener's dwelling.
Find a vane in the garden.
Find a vane in the gardener's lab.
A gang of Hiders have removed the pinwheel vanes that are used to open the gate leading to the hollow tree. Recover them all!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.b_3.des: It's time to repair that pinwheel lock! Once that's done, you should be able to get inside the hollow tree and look for the passage to the top.
It's time to repair that pinwheel lock! Once that's done, you should be able to get inside the hollow tree and look for the passage to the top.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.b_3.goa: Open the pinwheel gate and make your way inside the hollow tree. Once inside, search for the passage leading to the upper section of the big tree.
Open the pinwheel gate, and make your way inside the hollow tree. Once inside, search for the passage leading to the upper section of the big tree.
Search the crypt for a special key.
The door that leads to the treetop is locked, and it can only be opened with a special key that's hidden in an old crypt. Find the graveyard, enter the crypt and grab the key.
The special key is no longer in the crypt, but you've rescued a Toad assistant. Escort him to the gardener's lab and send him back to the bunker.
The special key is no longer in the crypt, but you've rescued a Toad assistant. Escort him to the gardener's lab and send him back to the bunker.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.b_4.des: The Toad you rescued in the crypt managed to bring back a snapshot from my tridimensional security system! Let's take a look at it.
The Toad you rescued in the crypt managed to bring back a snapshot from my tridimensional security camera! Let's take a look at it.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.b_4.goa: Reach the rooftop pool and look around for the special key.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.b_5.des: A very frisky spectral pooch took the special key that we need! Track the dog down and get that key back!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.b_5.goa: Use the Dark-Light Device to find the trail of paw prints that the ghostly dog left behind. Once you find the dog, recover the special key.
Use the Dark-Light Devices to find the trail of paw prints that the ghostly dog left behind. Once you find the dog, recover the special key.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.b_bonus: We have a small problem. The Parascope found significant paranormal signs in the towers. Nothing you can't manage!
We have a small problem. The Parascope found significant paranormal signs in the towers. Nothing you can't manage!
Ghosts have returned to the Haunted Towers! Find and capture all the ghosts as quickly as possible.
Capture all the ghosts as quickly as possible!
We've finally got our mitts on that elusive special key! Now we just need to get to the treetop and grab the Dark Moon piece.
Once inside the hollow tree, climb to the top and look for the Dark Moon piece in the tree house.
Find the Dark Moon piece in the tree house.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.c_1.des: Good news, %1$s. I've located the next Dark Moon piece. It's at the top of the clock tower. All you gotta do is mosey on up there and grab it! What could go wrong?
Good news, kiddos. I've located the next Dark Moon piece. It's at the top of the clock tower. All you gotta do is mosey on up there and grab it! What could go wrong?
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.c_1.goa: The Parascope has located a Dark Moon piece at the top of the clock tower. Use the lift behind the clock tower gate to get there.
Get to the clock tower gate.
The clock tower gate is missing some parts! The ghosts that took the parts have been located, but you'll need a special compass to reach them. Search the drafting office for it!
The clock tower gate is missing some parts! The ghosts that took the parts have been located, but you'll need a special compass to reach them. Search the drafting office for it!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.c_2.des: The special compass revealed another path to the underground! Let's hope the ghosts didn't hide the clock hands too well.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.c_2.goa: Explore the underground section of the Old Clockworks and retrieve the clock hands taken by the ghosts.
Look for the missing clock hands.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.c_3.des: That ancient ghost ran off with the clock hands we're looking for. Thankfully, his paranormal signature made him easy to find!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.c_3.goa: E. Gadd has located the Boffin in the roundhouse. Make your way there and recover the clock hands from the thieving phantom.
E. Gadd has located the Boffin in the roundhouse. Make your way there and recover the clock hands from the thieving phantom.
Find the Poltergeist in the roundhouse.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.c_4.des: Well, we've recovered the minute hand, but the hour hand is still missing. I've detected some signals in clockworks court, so let's start our search there.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.c_4.goa: A ghostly dog pinched the hour hand and vanished into the warehouse. Catch up to the dog before the ghosts do!
Chase the Polterpup and get the hour hand.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.c_5.des: There's just one last clock part we need to find before we can fix the clock tower gate, and I think I know where it is!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.c_5.goa: A ghost has made off with the rotor, the last piece needed to open the clock tower gate. Follow him and take it back!
Chase the ghost and get the rotor.
Meet the Toad in the synchronisation room.
Lead the Toad to the service elevator.
The rotor was taken into the storage room, which is locked. Look for E. Gadd's Toad assistant, and see if he can help.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.c_bonus: We've got a complication. There are paranormal signals in the Old Clockworks again! It's ghost-hunting time, sonny!
We've got a complication. There are paranormal signals in the Old Clockworks again! It's ghost-hunting time, kiddos!
Ghosts are back in the Old Clockworks! Capture all the ghosts without delay.
Capture all the ghosts as quickly as possible!
We finally have everything we need to reach the top of the clock tower! But first, let's check the security image that the Toad brought with him.
Open the clock tower gate, and get to the top of the clock tower. Then find and retrieve the Dark Moon piece.
Find and retrieve the Dark Moon piece.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.d_1.des: I can't seem to get hold of my Toad assistant at the chalet. He's probably napping in front of the fireplace again. It's hard to find good help these days!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.d_1.goa: The Toad assistant assigned to the Secret Mine is not answering E. Gadd's calls. Find him, then bring him back using the Pixelshift Screen in the chalet.
Look for the Toad in the chalet.
Look for the Toad in the fishing hut.
Send the Toad to the bunker.
Find the lift to the chalet. Once you're out of the cold, use the Pixelshift Screen to send the Toad back to the bunker.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.d_2.des: According to the Toad assistant, ghosts - Boos especially - have been very active in the mine. Perhaps the security image will tell us what they're up to.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.d_2.goa: The security image revealed strange events in the crystal quarry at the bottom of the mine. Get there as soon as possible and figure out what the Boos are doing with the ghosts.
Reach the bottom of the mine.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.d_3.des: Success! The Parascope has located both the Dark Moon piece and the Possessor ghost that has it. But you'll have to cross the chasm and reach the other side to find them!
Success! The Parascope has located both the Dark Moon piece and the Possessor ghost that has it. But you'll have to cross the chasm and reach the other side to find them!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.d_3.goa: Gain access to the gondola in the station. Ride across the chasm to reach the location of the Dark Moon piece.
Get rid of the paranormal chains.
Cross the chasm and reach the workshop.
Remove the paranormal chains that block the door to the gondola. Capture each ghostly culprit to break its chain.
Find another way to cross the chasm. Once you reach the workshop, look for the Dark Moon piece.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.d_bonus: We have an infestation on our hands! The Parascope is detecting strong paranormal signals throughout the Secret Mine. It's go time, %1$s!
We have an infestation on our hands! The Parascope is detecting strong paranormal signals throughout the Secret Mine. It's go time, kiddos!
Ghosts are back in the Secret Mine. Find and capture all the ghosts as fast as you can!
Capture all the ghosts as quickly as possible!
Bingo! I've found the Possessor hiding in the workshop! And if there's one thing we know by now, it's that where there are Possessors, there are Dark Moon pieces!
Open the door to the workshop. Once inside, search for the Dark Moon piece.
The Possessor is trying to get away, and the sledge is overheating! Catch that slippery spectre and retrieve the Dark Moon piece!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.e_1.des: The paranormal activity in this mansion is completely off the charts! Stay on your toes, and start looking for the Dark Moon piece.
The paranormal activity in this mansion is completely off the charts! Stay on your toes, and start looking for the Dark Moon piece.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.e_1.goa: Use the front door key to open the front entrance of the Treacherous Mansion. Once inside, start looking for the Dark Moon piece.
Follow the Polterpup, and recover the front door key.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.e_2.des: I assigned a Toad assistant to take care of the valuable exhibits in the Treacherous Mansion. Let's find him. He might know a thing or two about the Dark Moon piece.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.e_2.goa: Search the main floor of the Treacherous Mansion for the Toad assistant, and bring him back to the bunker.
Find and rescue the Toad assistant.
Send both Toads to the bunker.
Rescue the Toad in the ice age exhibit.
Rescue the Toad in the jungle exhibit.
It turns out E. Gadd assigned two Toad assistants to take care of the exhibits. Find the other Toad, and send both Toads back to the bunker.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.e_3.des: The Toad curators brought a security camera image back with them. Maybe it'll give us some clues about the next Dark Moon piece.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.e_3.goa: Use the makeshift rotor to activate the stairwell in the inner courtyard. Then rush to the train exhibit and rescue Mario.
Activate the stairwell in the inner courtyard.
Get to the train exhibit and look for Mario!
Find the Boffin and reclaim the book.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.e_4.des: %1$s, King Boo is in the train exhibit! Let's strike now while we have the element of surprise! Get in there, defeat King Boo and rescue Mario!
Kiddos, King Boo is in the train exhibit! Let's strike now while we have the element of surprise! Get in there, defeat King Boo, and rescue Mario!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.e_4.goa: King Boo seems to be up to something inside the train exhibit. Ambush him while he's distracted.
Ambush King Boo and rescue Mario.
The miniature model in the train exhibit was a trap! Defeat the Big Boo and escape King Boo's ruse.
The miniature model in the train exhibit was a trick! Defeat the Big Boo and escape King Boo's ruse.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.e_5.des: I'm getting strange paranormal readings on the terrace. We'd better send you in to inspect the place.
I'm getting strange paranormal readings on the terrace. We'd better send you in to inspect the place.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.e_5.goa: Reach the terrace and discover the source of the strong paranormal signal.
Capture all ghosts before it's too late!
King Boo has sent a horde of ghosts to start a paranormal riot. Capture all of the ghosts before they become too powerful to be stopped!
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.e_bonus: We have an EMERGENCY! The Parascope is detecting whopping paranormal signals in the mansion! %1$s... THE END IS NEAR!
We have an EMERGENCY! The Parascope is detecting whopping paranormal signals in the mansion! Kiddos... THE END IS NEAR!
Ghosts are invading the Treacherous Mansion! Go to each and every outbreak point and capture all the ghosts to prevent a paranormal catastrophe.
Capture all the ghosts as quickly as possible!
The portal on the terrace is still open, but we have to hurry. Button up those dungarees, my boy! It's time to battle King Boo!
The portal on the terrace is still open, but we've got to hurry. Button up those dungarees, kiddos! It's time to battle King Boo!
The portal has brought you to an unknown location! Look for the Possessor ghost and the final piece of the Dark Moon.
The portal has brought you to an unknown location! Look for the Possessor ghost and the final piece of the Dark Moon.
luigis_mansion_dark_moon:mission.final.d: This is it, %1$s. It's time to rescue your brother and stop King Boo for good.
This is it, kiddos. It's time to rescue your brother and stop King Boo for good.
